definition: (usually derog.) an old hand at sth

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
rarities from the mountain and the sea (idiom); fig. a sumptuous spread of food delicacies
too uncouth to appear in public (idiom)/unfit for a public role
to enumerate what is black and yellow (idiom); to criticize sb behind his back to incite quarrels/also written 數黑論黃|数黑论黄[shu3 hei1 lun4 huang2]
to exert flirtatious allure/to entice coquettishly
carrier who carries heavy loads on his shoulder (dialect)
dialectal equivalent of 沒什麼|没什么[mei2 shen2 me5]
at one's convenience/when one has time
